items.title: 'About our lives, but without our voice': Sidelined Ukrainians look on
items.description: Left uninvited to key talks, many Ukrainians look on with a mix of fatigue and mistrust.

items.title: Flash floods kill nearly 200 in Pakistan and Pakistan-administered Kashmir
items.description: The majority of deaths were recorded in Pakistan's mountainous Khyber Pakhtunkhwa area.

items.title: Far-right Israeli minister taunts prominent Palestinian prisoner
items.description: Video shows Itamar Ben Gvir telling the most prominent Palestinian prisoner Marwan Barghouti "you will not win".

items.title: Global plastic talks collapse as countries remain deeply divided
items.description: The latest round of UN-led talks have ended in deadlock, with disputes over plastic production and recycling.

items.title: Spain at 'extreme risk' of new wildfires as 14 blazes spread
items.description: Temperatures remain high across southern Europe with wildfires also affecting Portugal, Greece, France and the Balkans.
